name: OMG The Presidents Brain...
description:
Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

LMB - Fire Gun

R - Reload Gun

Q - Show/Hide Mobile Phone

E - Show/Hide Gun

Space - Jump

Secret Service OS Controls

0 > Back

1 > Helicopter Locator

2 > Map POTUS Locator

3 > Tranc Gun Locator

4 > POTUS Live Camera Feed
